title: Archlight Vel'Koz Basic att and ability glitches
body:
So was just playing a normal EUW game with archlight vel and suddenly i use W and basic attack right after my W as usual. Then vel'koz body went like crazy shapes.  Linking a ''animation'' of the glitch [](http://velkozglitch.corgiorgy.com/) There you go. I did not get a screenshot of the basic attacks.
But i hope i get some detication from finding this! {{champion:161}}

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! We're currently investigating the issue! :]
